backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing three frontend photo‑grid and fallback‑image updates with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including App.tsx, styles, Tailwind config, HTML entry, hooks, and StaticPhotoTile.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading main.tsx and setting the Valentine Proposal title and font preconnects.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the Valentine page with a static photo grid, YES/NO interaction, and success screen.
Image tile component that displays a static photo and falls back to a pink placeholder on load error.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Hook and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalPhotoTilePrev: Empty file placeholder for removed local photo preview logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup plus font imports and custom pink Valentine theme color variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry mounting React, wrapping with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and loading global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color palette (including pink), custom animations, and additional theme utilities.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current build requirements, theme updates, feature definitions, and known deployment issues.
